content: booties yarn 4 ply hook 3mm pattern notes  american crochet terms used throughout  size newborn only  this is rewritten from a pattern that is no longer available and is offered free with the hat  chain 3 starting chain is not classed as a stitch 1 chain 14 3 double_crochet in 4th chain from the hook double_crochet in next 9 7dc in end chain working up opposite side of the chain starting with next unworked chain double_crochet in 9 3dc in last chain and slip_stitch to first double_crochet 2 chain 3 4 double_crochet in same stitch 2dc in next 2 stitches double_crochet in next 9 2dc in next 7 must be in the previous row end stitches double_crochet in next 9 2dc in next 3 and slip_stitch to first double_crochet 3 chain 3 working in back loop double_crochet in each stitch slip_stitch to first double_crochet 4 chain 3 double_crochet in each stitch to slip_stitch to first double_crochet 5 chain 1 single_crochet in 16 half_double_crochet dc2tg 7 times half_double_crochet single_crochet in last 14 slip_stitch to first single_crochet 6 chain 1 single_crochet in 13 half_double_crochet dc2tg 3 times double_crochet dc2tg 3 times half_double_crochet single_crochet in last 11 slip_stitch to first single_crochet 7 chain 1 single_crochet in 10 half_double_crochet dc2tg 3 times double_crochet dc2tg 3 times half_double_crochet single_crochet in 8 slip_stitch to first single_crochet 8 chain 3 double_crochet in 12 dc2tg double_crochet dc2tg double_crochet in 10 slip_stitch to first double_crochet 9 chain 3 double_crochet in each stitch slip_stitch to first double_crochet 10 repeat row 9 11 chain 3 in back loop double_crochet in each stitch and slip_stitch to first double_crochet 12 chain 3 work alternate front post double_crochet and back post double_crochet slip_stitch to first double_crochet 13 repeat row 12 ensuring back post stitches are worked in previous row back post 14 repeat row 13 fasten_off and weave in ends please do not redistribute this pattern other than to link to source please do not copy and resell pattern any items made from this pattern can be sold as long as pattern source is stated 1 newborn booties  red spotty patterns & blog 2019 www facebook com/redspotty www ravelry com/designers/tracy-wade www etsy com/uk/shops/redspottypatterns
